name: Space Loss
description:
The rule is simple: if you get shot, you lose/gain play space.

Seven days in making, this simple top-down shooter was made for the second GamesPlusJam... jam, in which the theme was Space. Well, I've used the theme space, as in the 'area of a room', not space like galaxies etc. Whenever you take damage the room gets smaller or bigger (depends on the difficulty). Have fun!

Font used: m3x6 by Daniel Linssen

Controls:

WSAD || Controller Left Stick -- Move
Arrow Keys || ABXY on controller -- Shoot
J || Left Bumper -- Hurt yourself
ESC || BACK button -- Quit the game
